S04n455:1: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiḥ paripṛcchaya punarapyadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadoṣam,
S04n455:2: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anāgatapratyutpannakāle sattvānāṃ kravyādasattvagativāsanāvāsitānāṃ māṃsabhojagṛddhāṇāṃ rasatṛṣṇāprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāma,
S04n455:3: yathā ca te kravyādabhojinaḥ sattvā virāgya rasatṛṣṇāṃ dharmarasāhārakāṅkṣayā sarvasattvaikaputrakapremānugatāḥ parasparaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabheran |
S04n455:5: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyā vā viśramya anuttarāṃ tāthāgatīṃ bhūmimupasarpayeyuḥ |
S04n455:9: tava śāsane māṃsaṃ svayaṃ ca bhakṣyate,
S04n455:11: tatsādhu bhagavān sarvalokānukampakaḥ sarvasattvaiputrakasamadarśī mahākāruṇiko'nukampāmupādāya māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadeṣān deśayatu me,
S04n455:12: yathā ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāstathatvāya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayema |
S04n455:16: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt ||
S04n455:19: iha mahāmate anena dīrgheṇādhvanā saṃsaratāṃ prāṇināṃ nāstyasau kaścitsattvaḥ sulabharūpo yo na mātābhūtpitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā putro vā duhitā vā anyatarānyataro vā svajanabandhubandhūbhūto vā |
S04n455:20: tasya anyajanmaparivṛttāśrayasya mṛgapaśupakṣiyonyantarbhūtasya bandhorbandhubhūtasya vā sarvabhūtātmabhūtānupāgantukāmena sarvajantuprāṇibhūtasaṃbhūtaṃ māṃsaṃ kathamiva bhakṣyaṃ syādbuddhadharmakāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ?
S04n455:21: rākṣasasyāpi mahāmate tathāgatānāmimāṃ dharmasudharmatāmupaśrutya upagatarakṣabhāvāḥ kṛpālavā bhavanti māṃsabhakṣaṇavinivṛttāḥ,
S04n455:23: evaṃ tāvanmahāmate teṣu teṣu jātiparivarteṣu sarvasattvāḥ svajanabandhubhāvasaṃjñāḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyam |
S04n455:25: vyabhicārādapi mahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ cāritravato bodhisattvasya |
S04n455:27: tāni ca mahāmate vīthyantareṣvaurabhrikā bhakṣyāṇīti kṛtvā mūlyahetorvikrīyante yataḥ,
S04n455:30: udvejanakaratvādapi mahāmate bhūtānāṃ maitrīmicchato yogino māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya |
S04n455:31: tadyathāpi mahāmate ḍombacāṇḍālakaivartādīn piśitāśinaḥ sattvān dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā śvānaḥ prabhayanti bhayena,
S04n455:33: evameva mahāmate anye'pi khabhūjalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmajantavo ye māṃsāśino darśanāddūrādeva paṭunā ghrāṇenāghrāya gandhaṃ rākṣasasyeva mānuṣā drutamapasarpanti,
S04n455:35: tasmādapi ca mahāmate udvejanakaratvānmahāmaitrīvihāriṇo yogino māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya anāryajanajuṣṭaṃ durgandham |
S04n455:37: ṛṣibhojanāhāro hi mahāmate āryajano na māṃsarudhirāhāraḥ,
S04n455:39: bahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya |
S04n455:43: yannāmaite pūrvarṣibhojanānyapāsya kravyādā ivāmiṣāhārāḥ paripūrṇakukṣayaḥ khabhūmijalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmāṃstrāsayanto jantūn samutrāsayanta imaṃ lokaṃ samantataḥ paryaṭanti |
S04n455:48: tasmādbahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsaṃṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya ||
S04n455:50: mṛtasyāpi hi mahāmate manuṣyasya māṃse dahyamāne tadanyaprāṇimāṃse ca,
S04n455:53: ato'pi mahāmate śucikāmasya yoginaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya ||
S04n455:54: śmaśānikānāṃ ca mahāmate araṇyavanaprasthānyamanuṣyāvacarāṇi prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasatāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ vidyāṃ sādhayitukāmānāṃ vidyāsādhanamokṣavighnakaratvānmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayogasādhanāntarāyakaramityapi samanupaśyatāṃ mahāmate svaparātmahitakāmasya māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya |
S04n455:56: devatā api cainaṃ parivarjayantīti kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya |
S04n455:58: ityapi kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya |
S04n455:66: āhāre ca mātrāṃ na jānāti nāpyaśitapītakhāditākhāditasya samyagrasapariṇāmapuṣṭyādi samāsādayati,
S04n455:69: putramāṃsabhaiṣajyavadāhāraṃ deśayaṃścāhaṃ mahāmate kathamiva anāryajanasevitamāryajanavivarjitamevamanekadoṣāvahamanekaguṇavivarjitamanṛṣibhojanapraṇītamakalpyaṃ māṃsarudhirāhāraṃ śiṣyebhyo'nujñāpyāmi ?
S04n455:72: na ca mahāmate anāgate'dhvani ekeṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ vividhavinayavikalpavādināṃ kravyādakulavāsitāvāsitānāṃ rasatṛṣṇāvyavasitānāmidaṃ praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ pratibhāṣyate |
S04n455:73: na tu mahāmate pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāmavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ śrāddhānāmavikalpānāṃ bahulānāṃ śākyakulakulīnānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ kāyajīvitabhogānadhyavasitānāmarasagṛdhrāṇāmalolupānāṃ kṛpālūnāṃ sarvabhūtātmabhūtatāmupagantukāmānāṃ sarvasattvaikaputrakapriyadarśināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānamiti vadāmi ||
S04n455:75: sa māṃsabhojanāhārātiprasaṅgena pratisevamāno rasatṛṣṇādhyavasānaparamatayā māṃsāni mānuṣyāṇyapi bhakṣitavān |
S04n455:82: yasmādrājā anaparādhibhūtānukampakaḥ śibī duḥkhena mahatā lambhitaḥ |
S04n455:83: tadevamanekajanmābhyastamapi mahāmate devendrabhūtasya śakrasyāpi sataḥ svaparadoṣāvahanamabhūt,
S04n455:85: anyeṣāṃ ca mahāmate narendrabhūtānāṃ satāmaśvenāpahṛtānāmaṭavyāṃ paryaṭamānānāṃ siṃhyā saha maithunaṃ gatavatāṃ jīvitabhayādapatyāni cotpāditavantaḥ siṃhasaṃvāsānvayātkalmāṣapādaprabhṛtayo nṛpaputrāḥ pūrvajanmamāṃsādadoṣavāsanatayā manuṣyendrabhūtā api santo māṃsādā abhūvan |
S04n455:86: ihaiva ca mahāmate janmani saptakuṭīrake'pi grāme pracuramāṃsalaulyādatiprasaṅgena niṣevamānā mānuṣamāṃsādā ghorā ḍākā vā ḍākinyaśca saṃjāyante |
S04n455:87: jātiparivarte ca mahāmate tathaiva māṃsarasādhyavasānatayā siṃhavyāghradvīpivṛkatarakṣumārjārajambukolūkādipracuramāṃsādayoniṣu pracuratarapiśitāśanā rākṣasādighoratarayoniṣu vinipātyante |
S04n455:90: ityevamādayo mahāmate māṃsādadoṣāḥ prāgeva niṣevamānānāṃ samupajāyante,
S04n455:92: na ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā etāṃścānyāṃśca guṇadoṣānavabudhyante |
S04n455:93: evamādiguṇadoṣadarśanānmahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyeti vadāmi ||
S04n455:94: yadi ca mahāmate māṃsaṃ na kathaṃcana kecana bhakṣayeyuḥ,
S04n455:96: mūlyahetorhi mahāmate prāyaḥ prāṇino niraparādhino vadhyante svalpādanyahetoḥ |
S04n455:97: kaṣṭaṃ mahāmate rasatṛṣṇāyāmatisevatāṃ māṃsāni mānuṣānyapi mānuṣairbhakṣyante,
S04n455:99: prāyo mahāmate māṃsarasatṛṣṇārtairidaṃ tathā tathā jālayantramāviddhaṃ mohapuruṣaiḥ,
S04n455:101: na caiṣāṃ mahāmate kiṃkanīkṛtarūkṣacetasāṃ rākṣasānāmiva gataghṛṇānāṃ kadācidapi prāṇiṣu prāṇisaṃjñayā ghātayatāṃ bhakṣayatāṃ na ghṛṇotpadyate ||
S04n455:102: na ca mahāmate akṛtakamakāritamasaṃkalpitaṃ nāma māṃsaṃ kalpyamasti yadupādāya anujānīyāṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ |
S04n455:103: bhaviṣyanti tu punarmahāmate anāgate'dhvani mamaiva śāsane pravrajitvā śākyaputrīyatvaṃ pratijānānāḥ kāṣāyadhvajadhāriṇo mohapuruṣā mithyāvitarkopahatacetaso vividhavinayavikalpavādinaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiyuktā rasatṛṣṇādhyavasitāstāṃ tāṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇahetvābhāsāṃ granthayiṣyanti |
S04n455:111: yadi tu mahāmate anujñātukāmatā me syāt,
S04n455:112: kalpyaṃ vā me śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisevituṃ syāt,
S04n455:113: nāhaṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ sarvāmāṃsabhakṣaṇapratiṣedhaṃ kuryām,
S04n455:115: asmin mahāmate dharmakāmānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāmāraṇyakānāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ sarvayogasādhanāya sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ sarvamāṃsapratiṣedham ||
S04n455:116: tatra tatra deśanāpāṭhe śikṣāpadānāmanupūrvībandhaṃ niḥśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena trikoṭiṃ baddhvā na taduddiśya kṛtāni pratiṣiddhāni |
S04n455:118: iha tu sūtre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nirupāyena sarvaṃ pratiṣiddham |
S04n455:123: yadapi ca mahāmate mamābhyākhyānaṃ dātavyaṃ maṃsyante tathāgatenāpi paribhuktamiti,
S04n455:124: tadanyeṣāṃ mahāmate mohapuruṣāṇāṃ svakarmadoṣāvaraṇāvṛtānāṃ dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya saṃvartakaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n455:127: dharmāhārā hi mahāmate mama śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāśca nāmiṣāhārāḥ,
S04n455:129: dharmakāyā hi mahāmate tathāgatā dharmāhārasthitayo nāmiṣakāyā na sarvāmiṣāhārasthitayo vāntasarvabhavopakaraṇatṛṣṇaiṣaṇāvāsanāḥ sarvakleśadoṣavāsanāpagatāḥ suvimuktacittaprajñāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvadarśinaḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasamadarśino mahākāruṇikāḥ |
S04n455:130: so'haṃ mahāmate sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñī san kathamiva svaputramāṃsamanujñāsyāmi paribhoktuṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ,
S04n455:132: anujñātavānasmi śrāvakebhyaḥ svayaṃ vā paribhuktavāniti mahāmate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate ||
S04n455:134: madyaṃ māṃsaṃ palāṇḍuṃ na bhakṣayeyaṃ mahāmune |
S04n455:138: bhakṣyamāṇe ca ye deṣā abhakṣye tu guṇāśca ye |
S04n455:139: mahāmate nibodha tvaṃ ye doṣā māṃsabhakṣaṇe || 3 ||
S04n455:142: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃśca madyāni vividhāni ca |
S04n455:143: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ caiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet || 5 ||
S04n455:149: mūḍhasya saṃgatirbhavati jāyate na ca mucyate || 8 ||
S04n455:150: lābhārthaṃ hanyate sattvo māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanam |
S04n455:154: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakarmiṇaḥ |
S04n455:157: acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmānmāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet || 12 ||
S04n455:158: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayedyogī mayā buddhaiśca garhitam |
S04n455:168: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyeta atha vā yogināṃ kule |
S04n455:177: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret || 22 ||
